code: import React from'react';import Card from'../Card';import'./Cards.css';import firebase from'../../FirebaseConfig';var Cards=function Cards(_ref){var cards=_ref.cards,room_name=_ref.room_name,name=_ref.name,sessions=_ref.sessions,team_member=_ref.team_member;return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"centerDiv"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("ul",{className:"cards"},cards.map(function(card){return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("li",{className:"cards__card",key:card,onClick:function onClick(event){return handleClick(event,card,room_name,name,sessions,team_member);}},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Card,{card:card}));})));};var handleClick=function handleClick(event,point,room_name,name,sessions,team_member){event.preventDefault();if(!sessions&&team_member!==null){var members=[];team_member.map(function(member){return member.name!==name?members.push(member):members.push({name:name,story_point:point,status:true});});firebase.database().ref(room_name).update({team_member:members});console.log("coba click kartu: "+point);}};export default Cards;
